page.title: 11PUBLIC TRANSPORT
page.content: The village is poorly served by public transport.With the exeption of the daily buses and taxis provided during term time by the Local Education Authority for the conveyance of children to their schools there are only{two}return bus journeys each week between{Coverack and Helston.}A taxi service is available from the local garage. The garage is also able to provide a mini-bus or coaches for larger paries and for transport to special events, such as organised theatre parties, special shopping trips, etc. Most householders consider it essential to own a car or other form of{personal transport,}and this is most necessary for working people, who have no option but to provide their own transport to their places of work.
